text:
TIRUNELVELI

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, V.K. Nursery and Primary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

VALLIYOOR

Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation: Grievance day for consumers of Valliyoor, Office of Executive Engineer, 11 a.m.

PULIYAMPATTI

St. Antony’s Shrine: Annual feast, 13th day celebrations, Holy Mass, 6 a.m. and 7.30 a.m., special prayers for patients suffering from ailments, 10 a.m., special Holy Mass by Rt. Rev. Fr. Antony Paappusamy, Bishop of Madurai Arch Diocese, 11.30 a.m., Holy Mass by Jesuit Priests, St. Xavier’s Institutions, Palayamkottai, and benediction, church premises, 6.30 p.m.
title: engagements
